    ); } async function getProducts() { let DOMelem = document.getElementById('products'); const register_url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products"; const requestOptions = { method: 'GET' }; await fetch(register_url, requestOptions).then((response) => response.json()).then((data) => { let products = data.data; let cols = 0; products.forEach(element => { let name = element.name; let description = element.description; let image = element.image; let price = element.price; let stock = element.stock; let created_at = element.created_at; }); }).catch(err => console.log(err)); }
